quest.name: Open Water
journal: One does not simply cross the Ruby Sea, as Soroban well knows.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Somewhere out there, across the water, is Yugiri and Gosetsu's homeland...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text:
Woe betide any enemy foolish enough to attack by sea.
Now, if the Garleans were to bring their airships, on the other hand...

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: The Hingans built this island as a bulwark against invasion, and filled it with enough cannons to sink an armada.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Now, in order to reach the shores of Othard, you will need to cross the resplendent waters you see before you. However, this is easier said than done.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: To set forth without making the necessary preparations is to invite the Confederacy to claim your vessel─and your life should you resist.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: But this fate can be avoided by paying the Ruby Tithe, thereby earning you the blessing of the pirate lords.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: So─let us go and greet them. Our destination is the isle to the west.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: That doesn't look very far to me. Forename, why don't we jump in and swim for it? I've had my fill of boats.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Hmm, an excellent idea! I think you shall find the water to your liking.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: I will use my ship to deliver those less inclined to the isle.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Not that I've anything against the occasional dip in the ocean, but to dive in on a whim is a bit...hm.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Ho, what spirit you two have to delight in this simple joy so readily!

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Hm? Is Lyse not with you?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Right, this should be easy! And a good way to loosen up before the next fight, whenever it comes.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Twenty gil says I beat you there!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> ...Not bad. We'll call it a draw!

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. I trust you enjoyed yourselves.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Follow me, my friends. The one with whom we must speak is a man named Tansui.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Ugh... My clothes have mostly dried, but they're a bit clingy. Still, no regrets!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I wonder─Lominsan pirates have been known to say things like, “Arrr,” but surely pirates on the opposite side of the world would use different expressions? “Errr,” or “Urrr,” or “Arururu,” perhaps?

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Doma's position on the Confederacy could be best described as one of “guarded acceptance.” They are pirates, aye, but they adhere to a code and are a stabilizing force in the Ruby Sea.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: This one is Tansui. Come, come, introduce yourselves.

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: ...I fear you have the advantage of me.

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: Most honorable and esteemed Forename Surname. I am Tansui, a humble mate who serves at the pleasure of the Confederacy's captain.

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: As you are in the company of the shellback, I presume we have business to discuss...

obj.n: Once More, to the Ruby Sea
